title: Ep 297: Anthony Jeselnik Brings the Funeral Vibes
itunes:title: Ep 297: Anthony Jeselnik Brings the Funeral Vibes
description:
Bobby pitches himself as a friend. Anthony is a meal friend. We talk Korean dogs, epilogues, comics pushing comics, and our tributes to Carl LaBove and Jeff Scott.

Anthony Jeselnik is a stand-up comedian who can currently be heard on the All Things Comedy podcast THE JESELNIK AND ROSENTHAL VANITY PROJECT. His new Netflix special FIRE IN THE MATERNITY WARD is on Netflix. Anthony has written for and appeared on several roasts for Comedy Central, most notably THE ROAST OF DONALD TRUMP and THE ROAST OF CHARLIE SHEEN.
